articles.author: David  Pogue
articles.title: 2025 holiday gift ideas from Techno Claus - CBS News
articles.description: Who dresses as St. Nick and speaks an odd brogue? Why, it's Techno Claus (a.k.a. David Pogue)! He offers "Sunday Morning" viewers his valuable tips for the gadget lovers on your gift-giving list.
articles.content:
Techno Claus (who looks suspiciously like correspondent David Pogue) emerges from the fireplace, as is his wont every year at this time… 
It's Techno Claus, back for my visit this year,'Cause breaki… [+3358 chars]

articles.author: Mike Wall
articles.title: Watch Rocket Lab launch Japanese technology-demonstrating satellite to orbit tonight - Space
articles.description: Liftoff of the "RAISE and Shine" mission is scheduled for 10 p.m. ET tonight (Dec. 6).
articles.content:
Rocket Lab will launch a Japanese technology-demonstrating satellite tonight (Dec. 6), and you can watch the action live.
A 59-foot-tall (18 meters) Electron
